thread.title: Muscat to host AMAN Union's permanent HQ
thread.title_full: Muscat to host AMAN Union's permanent HQ | MENAFN.COM

author: Muscat Daily
title: Muscat to host AMAN Union's permanent HQ
text:
(MENAFN - Muscat Daily) Muscat has been elected to host the permanent headquarters of the AMAN Union secretariat general. The selection was made through an online poll among the 18 full members representing national and multilateral export credit agencies.  Muscat which competed against three other cities received 61 per cent of the votes.
AMAN Union is a professional forum of commercial and non-commercial risk insurers and reinsurers in member countries of the Organization of the Islamic Conference and the Arab Investment & Export Credit Guarantee Corporation a press release said.
AMAN Union aims at promoting and developing the commercial and non-commercial risk insurance industry in member countries and strengthening mutual relationships among members through a range of activities. Oman joined AMAN Union on October 28 2009. 
On this occasion Said bin Saleh al Kiyumi chairman of the board of directors said the selection of Muscat as the host city of the permanent headquarters of the AMAN Union is a great gain to the sultanate in the prosperous era of His Majesty Sultan Qaboos bin Said. 'The selection wouldn't have materialised without the concerted efforts of the previous members of the board who had a positive impact on the agency's operations over the past years.'
